achText: You took your first swing by leveling your Strength to 1! You might feel sore, but your strength is increasing.
You have learned how to do a barrel roll by leveling your Strength to 3!
You have increased awareness of your form by leveling your Strength to 5!
You have gained the strength to carve up your enemies by leveling your Strength to 7!
You have mastered the art of reducing your opponents to ruin by leveling your Strength to maximum (10)!
You took your first lap by leveling your Speed to 1! You're tired now, but it will get easier. Keep at it!
You have forayed into bear racing. Your Speed has leveled to 3!
Catching prey has become easier as your body has grown leaner and faster. You've leveled your Speed to 5!
You won your first bear race! You've leveled your speed to 7!
You have blazed a path around your opponents by leveling your Speed to maximum (10)!
You took your first stand by leveling your Stamina to 1! Don't worry, it gets easier.
You stood to juggle for an audience by leveling your Stamina to 3!
You held your breath and caught salmon by leveling your Stamina to 5!
You are ready to endure ferocious battles. Your Stamina is level 7!
You broke out of the circus by leveling your Stamina to maximum (10)! You are now ruler of the wilds!
